title: Signature 12 - Koswatte Road, Nawala, Rajagiriya.
details:
Sixth Floor Apartment

Fully equipped with German made Hacker pantry cupboards.
Appliances included with the apartment:
Bosch refrigerator
Bosch Microwave and Oven
Bosch 4 burner Gas cooker with slimline hood

Bathware by Roca, Spain.
Mahogany Wet Kitchen with granite top.
Maids room with attached bathroom.
LED Lights.
Inverter-Air conditioners for all rooms, living and dining rooms included.
Built-In wall cupboards for all rooms.
All doors and frames in solid teak wood.
Aluminium french windows with double glazed glass with heat and sound proofing.

Fully equipped with highly efficient Solar Panels for apartment units and common areas and more.

Viewing by Prior Appointment.
